description:
In our world of 7.2 BILLION people where 1% owns 50% of all resources in our world. One would question, "isn't that the CONSPIRACY?" Especially since there are over 100 million homeless worldwide.

Can we suspect that ALIEN ENCOUNTERS has caused this? How do we know that they are not WORKING WITH US? Or even worse, AGAINST US? The question is WHAT DO WE KNOW?

Everyone has their belief systems on how things work. Even though we joke about a tin foil hat society, one has to actually look at our world and wonder WHAT SECRETS lie hidden in plain sight.

In this course, we discuss these types of topics and try to approach them objectively. In every lie and every story there is some truth. This course is about looking at all of those pieces and trying to put the puzzle back together.

  • Ancient Civilizations
  • Gold
  • Mythology
  • Roswell
  • Declassified Documents
  • Alien Encounters
  • Blue Planet Project
  • Secret Bases
  • Chem Trails
  • THE ILLUMINATI
  • World Banks
  • Money and the Slave System
  • AND SO MUCH MORE!!!

If you were ever interested in conspiracy theory's or your curious ENROLL TODAY! Lets seek out the answers together...
title: Conspiracy Fact or Fiction? You Decide!
